author: kpedro88
body: Port of #12 to the older version. Similar problems have started to arise in 7_1_43_patch1, though they do not occur in 7_1_38_patch1. Some change in externals moved stack memory around so uninitialized member variables that were serendipitously `false` are now `true`.
title: Fix all uninitialized member variables [226]
